author: werpu
msg: Fixed up the form determination code, so that it can handle detachement cases and multiple forms
Also fixed up the detachment code in the jsf.ajax.request part, it was buggy
we now can deal with replacement elements properly which just can deliver
the submit name, if a form can be idenitified uniquely.
This should now finally hopefully allow frameworks like dojo to work properly,
additional testing is needed (I will run some dijit testing) but I assume
the commit is more important, since it does not break anything (hopefully)

author: sjiang
msg: Added TS-283 to list of proposed backport, voted on TS-272 backport.

author: dezzio
msg: OpenJPA-1610: Updated documentation for new method name detachCopy.

author: not
msg: ARIES-128 Wrap the calls to Bundle.getResource getResources and load class in an AccessController so the BundleToClassLoaderAdapter works like a bundle classloader when Java 2 security is enabled in the jvm.
